title: How to solve the ‘Crrk?’ prophecy tablet in Honkai: Star Rail
description: As you hunt down prophecy tablets and other puzzles around Amphoreus in Honkai: Star Rail, you’ll find one with no prompt shown on the left side though, saying “Crrk?” This tablet is in Janusopolis, in the room where the Trailblazer and Dan Heng first crash landed on Amphoreus. Your character will note that it likely […]
author: Julia Lee
excerpt: How to complete this blank puzzle
text: Image: Hoyoverse via PolygonJulia Lee (she/her) is a guides producer, writing guides for games like The Legend of Zelda: Tears of the Kingdom and Pokémon Go. She helped launch the Rift Herald in 2016.As you hunt down prophecy tablets and other puzzles around Amphoreus in Honkai: Star Rail, you’ll find one with no prompt shown on the left side though, saying “Crrk?” This tablet is in Janusopolis, in the room where the Trailblazer and Dan Heng first crash landed on Amphoreus.Your character will note that it likely has to do with creation nymphs — which is correct. Collecting the nymphs will show you a slice of the solution. However, even without doing this, you can brute force the puzzle by just putting in the right answer. That said, even the rewards for collecting the nymph doesn’t show the full puzzle. It only shows a quadrant of it, and you’ll need to collect the other pieces from players to actually put together the solution. (Again, you don’t have to. You can just input the puzzle solution as displayed below.)This follows a line of somewhat complex puzzles that are part of Amphoreus’ nymphs collection, like the nymph’s hidden message in Okhema.If you don’t care about any of that and you just want the goods, we have the solution to the “Crrk?” prophecy tablet in Honkai: Star Rail below.‘Crrk?’ prophecy tablet solution in Honkai: Star Rail1/6This is what the screen will look like at the start. Graphic: Julia Lee/Polygon | Source images: HoyoverseNote that you technically don’t need to do these steps in any specific order, as long as the pieces are in the correct space. We numbered our solution just to match up with the gallery above.Drag the top diamond on to the left side of the middle square.Move the left triangle to the bottom left of the square, so half of it is on top of the square.Move the top triangle (the upper half of the square at the bottom) to the bottom half of the center square.Move the bottom triangle (the lower half of what used to be a square at the bottom) on top of the triangle you just placed.Move the remaining right triangle on the top right of the center square, so half of it is on top of the square.For your troubles, you’ll get the usual bounty of 30 Stellar Jade, 300 credits, and 60 Celestial Ambrosia. You’ll also get the “Abyss of Fate” Hymn Tablet mission item and the achievement “Chirping Secret: Many-Faced.”
html:
Image: Hoyoverse via Polygon

Julia Lee (she/her) is a guides producer, writing guides for games like The Legend of Zelda: Tears of the Kingdom and Pokémon Go. She helped launch the Rift Herald in 2016.

As you hunt down prophecy tablets and other puzzles around Amphoreus in Honkai: Star Rail, you’ll find one with no prompt shown on the left side though, saying “Crrk?” This tablet is in Janusopolis, in the room where the Trailblazer and Dan Heng first crash landed on Amphoreus.

Your character will note that it likely has to do with creation nymphs — which is correct. Collecting the nymphs will show you a slice of the solution. However, even without doing this, you can brute force the puzzle by just putting in the right answer. That said, even the rewards for collecting the nymph doesn’t show the full puzzle. It only shows a quadrant of it, and you’ll need to collect the other pieces from players to actually put together the solution. (Again, you don’t have to. You can just input the puzzle solution as displayed below.)

This follows a line of somewhat complex puzzles that are part of Amphoreus’ nymphs collection, like the nymph’s hidden message in Okhema.

If you don’t care about any of that and you just want the goods, we have the solution to the “Crrk?” prophecy tablet in Honkai: Star Rail below.

‘Crrk?’ prophecy tablet solution in Honkai: Star Rail

1/6

Graphic: Julia Lee/Polygon | Source images: Hoyoverse

Note that you technically don’t need to do these steps in any specific order, as long as the pieces are in the correct space. We numbered our solution just to match up with the gallery above.

  1. Drag the top diamond on to the left side of the middle square.
  2. Move the left triangle to the bottom left of the square, so half of it is on top of the square.
  3. Move the top triangle (the upper half of the square at the bottom) to the bottom half of the center square.
  4. Move the bottom triangle (the lower half of what used to be a square at the bottom) on top of the triangle you just placed.
  5. Move the remaining right triangle on the top right of the center square, so half of it is on top of the square.

For your troubles, you’ll get the usual bounty of 30 Stellar Jade, 300 credits, and 60 Celestial Ambrosia. You’ll also get the “Abyss of Fate” Hymn Tablet mission item and the achievement “Chirping Secret: Many-Faced.”
